description: This file defines a React functional component called TopBar, which serves as a header bar in a note management application. It includes UI elements such as a title, search input, action buttons for toggling search, displaying information, creating a new note, and handling user authentication actions like sign out. The component manages both controlled and uncontrolled search state, supports responsive design, and interacts with context providers for authentication and notes management.

methods.name: TopBar({ onNewNote, showSearch: showSearchProp, onToggleSearch, onInfo: onInfoProp })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the top navigation bar, handling search toggle, information display, new note creation, and user sign-out functionalities.

methods.name: toggleSearch
methods.description: Callback to toggle the visibility of the search input, either via parent control or internal state.

methods.name: onInfo
methods.description: Callback invoked when the info button is clicked; shows an alert or calls a parent-provided function.

ctags.name: TopBar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopBar({ onNewNote, showSearch: showSearchProp, onToggleSearch, onInfo: /
ctags.signature: ({ onNewNote, showSearch: showSearchProp, onToggleSearch, onInfo: onInfoProp })
